statements: SELECT * FROM ChangeOrders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT project_id, description FROM ChangeOrders WHERE project_id = 1001;
SELECT change_order_id, project_id, status FROM ChangeOrders WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT description, created_at FROM ChangeOrders ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChangeOrders WHERE project_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003);
SELECT * FROM ChangeOrders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT project_id, description FROM ChangeOrders WHERE project_id = 101 ORDER BY change_order_id ASC;
SELECT change_order_id, description, status FROM ChangeOrders WHERE status IN ('Approved', 'Rejected') ORDER BY change_order_id DESC;
SELECT change_order_id, project_id, description, status FROM ChangeOrders WHERE project_id = 102 ORDER BY change_order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ChangeOrders WHERE description LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM change_orders;
SELECT id, order_name FROM change_orders WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT order_description, order_name FROM change_orders ORDER BY order_name DESC;
SELECT id, revision_name, revision_date FROM project_revisions WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_revisions WHERE revision_name LIKE '%v1%';
SELECT id, order_name, order_description FROM change_orders WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM change_orders WHERE id = 5;
SELECT revision_name, revision_description, revision_date FROM project_revisions WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_revisions WHERE project_id = 3 AND revision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revision_date ASC;
SELECT id, order_name, project_id FROM change_orders WHERE order_name LIKE '%urgent%' OR order_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project_revisions WHERE revision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM change_orders WHERE order_id > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id = 5
SELECT order_description, order_date FROM change_orders WHERE order_id < 50 AND project_id = 3 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT project_name, COALESCE(project_description,'No description available') AS project_description FROM projects
SELECT project_name, revision_description FROM projects JOIN project_revisions ON projects.project_id = project_revisions.project_id ORDER BY revision_date
SELECT * FROM change_order;
SELECT id, description FROM change_order ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, status FROM change_order WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM project WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, end_date FROM project WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM change_order WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT id, description FROM change_order ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT project.name, revision.revision_number FROM project JOIN revision ON project.id = revision.project_id ORDER BY revision.revision_number ASC;
SELECT user.name, user.role, change_order.description FROM user JOIN change_order ON user.id = change_order.project_id WHERE user.role='Administrator';

SELECT project.name AS project_name, COALESCE(revision.revision_number, 0) AS latest_revision FROM project LEFT JOIN revision ON project.id = revision.project_id ORDER BY latest_revision DESC, project.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM change_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_revisions WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT id, project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_id, team_member_name, role FROM project_team WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT project_id, status FROM project_status WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_team.team_member_name, project_team.role, projects.project_name FROM project_team INNER JOIN projects ON project_team.project_id = projects.id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, project_team.team_member_name, project_team.role FROM projects LEFT JOIN project_team ON projects.id = project_team.project_id;

SELECT projects.project_name, project_status.status, project_team.team_member_name FROM projects INNER JOIN project_status ON projects.id = project_status.project_id INNER JOIN project_team ON projects.id = project_team.project_id WHERE project_status.completion_date < '2022-12-31';
